currencies.name: Copper Coin
currencies.description: A basic copper coin, the smallest unit of standard currency.

currencies.name: Silver Coin
currencies.description: A silver coin, worth more than copper but less than gold.

currencies.name: Gold Coin
currencies.description: A valuable gold coin, widely accepted in trade.

currencies.name: Platinum Coin
currencies.description: A rare platinum coin, the highest denomination of standard currency.

currencies.name: Credits
currencies.description: A digital currency used for premium transactions.
